text: Mina Pandey (also Meena, also Pande; born 11 May 1952, in Bethan-2, Ramechhap) is a Nepali politician and a member of the House of Representatives of the Federal Parliament of Nepal. She is also a member of the State Affairs and Good Governance Committee of the parliament. She was elected from Nepali Congress under the proportional representation system. In the 2013 Constituent Assembly election, she was a candidate for Nepali Congress in the Sarlahi-2 constituency. ==References== Category:Living people Category:21st-century women politicians Category:21st-century Nepalese women Category:Nepali Congress politicians Category:Members of the House of Representatives (Nepal) Category:1952 births Category:People from Ramechhap District
title: Mina Pandey
